channel.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
channel.description: So yea one day someone logged on and said your servers getting ddosed then it did can I fix this? Because now I cannot run my server.

item.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage Owner Zack of PwnageScape
item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

They didn’t DDoS you. They simply disconnected your server. No one with any sense what so ever would DDoS a private server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

I was disconnected. Did you do that? Or did our session expire. I need your info again if our session expired.

Read full topic

item.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
item.dc:creator: @MoralMerk MoralMerk
item.description:
@MoralMerk wrote:

[quote=“austinsobes, post:8, topic:435024”][quote author=MoralMerk link=topic=537743.msg3932568#msg3932568 date=1330810123]

Can YOU connect to it? This sounds like a hosting problem. Either their client has an IP address that isn’t valid inside of their source codes. Or you aren’t properly hosting it.
[/quote] It was working correctly until they “DdOsed” me… if you would like to connect to me on teamviewer and help me pinpoint it I would appreciate tht

Private message me and we can try to get this situated. No promises that I will be able to fix it. But I can try and help.[/quote]
sent it…

Read full topic

item.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes

Can YOU connect to it? This sounds like a hosting problem. Either their client has an IP address that isn’t valid inside of their source codes. Or you aren’t properly hosting it.
[/quote] It was working correctly until they “DdOsed” me… if you would like to connect to me on teamviewer and help me pinpoint it I would appreciate tht[/quote]

Private message me and we can try to get this situated. No promises that I will be able to fix it. But I can try and help.

Well for other people it says “Error Connecting to Server”

item.title: Server got DDOSED Help Please
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

MoralMerk:

Then any reason it wont run now???

There can be hundreds of reason. And saying ‘It won’t run’ doesn’t give us a narrow list. Tell us exactly what your problem is. Are you not able to connect? Does it give any type of error? Does the Client not even start up? Does your run.bat in your server not work? You need to be more specific.

Read full topic
